text: White Light/White Heat is the second studio album by American rock band The Velvet Underground. ==Songs from the album== All songs written by Lou Reed unless otherwise noted. ;Side one #"White Light/White Heat" – 2:47 #"The Gift" (Reed, Morrison, Cale, Tucker) – 8:18 #"Lady Godiva's Operation" – 4:56 #"Here She Comes Now" (Reed, Morrison, Cale) – 2:04 ;Side two # * "I Heard Her Call My Name" – 4:38 #"Sister Ray" (Reed, Morrison, Cale, Tucker) – 17:27 ==References== Category:The Velvet Underground albums Category:1968 albums Category:Rock albums
title: White Light/White Heat
